There are some important changes coming to the web version of AFFiNE. Make sure you understand the changes to ensure you keep your data safe.



### What is happening?

We  are upgrading [app.affine.pro](app.affine.pro) to use the latest version of AFFiNE. At the time of publishing this article, the [app.affine.pro](app.affine.pro) web app uses an old version of AFFiNE Cloud which is no longer supported. We will upgrade this web version and retire the old version - along with the old data.



### What do I need to do?

#### If you have ever used [app.affine.pro](app.affine.pro)

* Head over to [app.affine.pro](app.affine.pro) and backup all your data - local and cloud workspaces
* All local data will be completely lost after December 14th
* We will keep a temporary copy after December 14 on [archive.affine.pro](archive.affine.pro) (will go live from December 11 onwards)
#### If you are using [insider.affine.pro](insider.affine.pro)

* Your AFFiNE Cloud data will be acacessible on the new [app.affine.pro](app.affine.pro) version after it is updated (after December 14th)
* You will lose access to any local storage data - we advise you to download the [AFFiNE Client](https://affine.pro/download) and activate AFFiNE Cloud
#### If you are using the [AFFiNE Client](https://affine.pro/download)

* There's no action you need to take


### More questions?

If you still have questions or concerns please do email us: [support@toeverything.info](mailto:support@toeverything.info)
